name: Kerry Tepedino
what_you_do: Mindset expert who helps women transform their lives through mindset mastery, emotional intelligence, and self-love strategies.
who_you_serve: Women feeling stressed, overwhelmed, and dealing with self-sabotage.
social_proof: #1 Best Selling Book on Amazon (One Thought Away), HHP/CCN/CST credentials, influenced 250k+ people globally
signature_programs: One Thought Away (book), One Thought Away Project, Sacred Self System, Dream Life Creation Course, Dare to Dream Experience, Living Beyond the Hustle (retreat), 21-Day Mind & Body Detox Program, Uncovering Blindspots (webinar), One Thought Away: The Wealth Edition
business_focus: CEO and Founder of the One Thought Away Project, a global company and movement helping women transform their mindset to create their dream life.
service_provided: Mindset coaching, books, online courses, retreats, masterclasses, speaking
